_header: Behold thou man with ruthful heart
_description: Learn Love from Christ’s Sufferings — eight lines

BLHar7322.Transcription:
Biholt þu man wiþ Routhful herteþe sharpe scourge
                    wiþ knottes smerteMi blodi bak wiþ hit his betenLeorne mon
                    þi lust to letenffor wiþ þis sper þat is so
                    grilMin herte was stongen so was my uelffor sone of þe þat
                    was so dereWel auȝtest þou of loue to lere
BLHar7322.Editions:
Furnivall,  Frederick James,
                        ed.  
             Political, Religious and Love Poems, from Lambeth MS. 306 and other
                sources.
